about_the_game:
IMPORTANT: Playtest versions are alpha/ beta versions. You must join the Discord to give feedback.

Procedurally Driven Animations

Importing Audio / MIDI files and a 3D character will automatically and accurately be animated playing the keys on the Piano or hitting the correct Drums.

Learn To Play

Play and practice piano, drums and other instruments directly in the app. Connect your MIDI Keyboard to practice Piano playing or connect MIDI controllers like the MPK Mini to practice playing drums. Start with selected lessons or import your own songs to practice... Simple 2D interface that teaches timing and correct keys.

Record, Create Or Import


Record your live performance or Import your music/MIDI and experience various MIDI driven/audio-driven levels or maps.

Render Music Visualizers

Direct and render music visualizers from your audio or MIDI files. Unreal Musician offers both 2D scenes and Full 3D cinematic scene templates to play with... Or customize and build your scenes.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 11 64 Bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1080
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11 64 Bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen-7 or above
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 3070
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
